page.title: 11DITTON RECREATIONAL ASSOC.
page.content: The{Playing Field}was constructed from meadow land in {1982, }the population of Ditton paid by fund raising events, loans and grants. It took the { {Territorial Army Unit}6 months to level and flatten the field. {Mr.D. {Shotton }seeded it and planted all the saplings.The{Playing Field}has an area of approximately 4 acres. The{Pavilion}has an extraodinary history,it blew down in a storm during its construction, it is being rebuilt in{1985}by{N.A.C.R.O. In the future it is hoped to raise money for a childrens adventure play _ ground and a full size football pitch. The{school}uses it during school time, Youth Clubs,Playgroup,and local residents also use it. The{Playing Field}is controlled by a committee made up from representatives of all the local organisations.
